name: Royal Idle: Medieval Quest
description:
Collect gold and emeralds, build your kingdom, and journey to new adventure!

A thousand years ago, the Emerald Kingdom was a vast land where the Faeries lived alongside humans. But our ancestors angered the Faerie Kings, who used their powerful magic to raise tall mountains around their domain, sealing the humans out from their lands.

The few who tried to climb the mountains returned with tales of war, dragons, spirits, a great cataclysm, and the fall of the faerie civilization.

But then, an earthquake last spring opened a new pass through the Forbidden Valley and into the ruins of the Emerald Kingdom.

As the king or queen of the land, you’ll summon your bravest subjects to follow you into the unknown, build prosperous new towns, and explore the valley’s secrets in search of magical trinkets and treasure.

Glory awaits, your Highness! Explore the Forbidden Valley and build your kingdom to unlock the secrets of the fallen empire.


FEATURES
AUTOMATE your businesses and earn limitless gold while you're offline.
INVEST your idle gold into your townships and watch your gold multiply.
COLLECT unique characters to help strengthen your town.
EXPLORE new settlements and continue your journey, one village at a time.
COMPETE in special events to reach the top of the leaderboards.

Reach the Forbidden Valley and find limitless prosperity!

Please Note: Royal Idle: Medieval Quest is a free-to-play game, but some extra game items can be purchased for real money. You can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Playing Medieval Idle requires a secure internet connection.
